nodes.bodyText: Are there any changes between java 9 and java 11 in regards to platform class loader? Was getPlatformClassLoader() method removed? Is there different model of classloaders?
This is a dedicated method on Java 9 to access class loader that you want to use here in Presto.

Commit message is invalid:
You says that: Use platform classloader in Java 8 and 11 for plugins, while we were already using platform classloader for java 9 and so I guess it was working as well for java 11.
This is the line that only be fixed. null (bootstrap CL) should be replaced with getSystemClassLoader().getParent()).

As I stated above, our goal is not to get the platform cl, but instead "The goal with the plugin class loader is to exclude the system classes, because these are the Presto application classes."  This means we want to use the same code for all JVM versions.
